doc.field: American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (AFTRA) National Office Records
American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (AFTRA) National Office Records

This series consists of the National Office's interactions with the major networks: ABC (American Broadcasting Corporation), CBS (Columbia Broadcasting System), NBC (National Broadcasting System), and Dumont. Materials include agreements, codes, claims, arbitrations, and correspondence.
American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (AFTRA) National Office Records
